name: deviceState_getSupportedModes
description: This function is used to inquire about the available modes of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to inquire about the supported modes.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to inquire about the supported modes.
